About

[UNDER CONSTRUCTION]


I'm Ali Morshid, a software engineer with a keen eye for design and an ever-increasing thirst for knowledge.


Background

I'm a fourth year Computer Science student at the University at Buffalo expecting to graduate in May 2018.

I'm a person who lives to learn new things and discover new experiences, this has allowed me to be well-rounded in more than one field of Computer Science. I consider myself as person who is adaptable and not afraid to try new technologies, which is why I'm always up-to-date with the newest tech stacks. You can see in my projects section that I have dabbled with anything from high-level programming (front-end software development) to low-level programming (real-time embedded system development.)

When I'm not glued to my computer screen, I'm probably playing or watching soccer, reading fiction, or learning new languages (currently learning Japanese) But not necessarily doing those things in that order.

Currently seeking full-time opportunities!
